title: ‘The New Marker of Elite Performance’: Why ‘Durability’ Is the New Must-Know Metric in Pro Cycling
content:
Step aside VO2 Max and Power-to-Weight: 'Durability' is now seen as the defining marker of monument champions and grand tour greats.

Read the full article at ‘The New Marker of Elite Performance’: Why ‘Durability’ Is the New Must-Know Metric in Pro Cycling on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
